TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FormsAuthenticationUser extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class FormsAuthenticationUser Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 對使用表單型驗證的 Web 應用程式，設定使用者的認證。

span.span: Configures the user's credentials for Web applications that use forms-based authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供方法來以程式設計方式存取和修改組態檔的區段。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the section of a configuration file. 此類型屬於的群組，其中包含、 ，而型別。This type is part of a group that includes the , the , and the types. 集合型別以外的類型會直接影響基礎的組態標記。The types other than the collection type directly affect the underlying configuration tags. > [!NOTE] > 可將資訊寫入至位於機器、 網站或應用程式層級的組態檔的相關區段。The can write information into the related section of the configuration file at machine, site, or application level only. 任何嘗試寫入階層中不同層級的組態檔中將會導致由剖析器產生的錯誤訊息。Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a different level in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser. 不過，您可以使用這個類別來讀取階層架構中的任何層級的組態資訊。However, you can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy. 基於安全性和延展性，建議您使用外部儲存機制，例如資料庫、 使用，來保留使用者的認證。For safety and scalability, it is recommended that you use an external repository, such as a database, to keep the users' credentials. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得存取現有的 Web 應用程式的物件。The following code example shows how to obtain the to access the objects of an existing Web application. 組態檔會包含類似下面的安裝程式。The configuration file will contain a setup similar to the following. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用[認證進行驗證 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的表單項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5a001f8-fdbe-4c88-80ca-bfe36df23479)區段中，務必遵循的指導方針，說明請參閱[ASP.NET 驗證](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1)。If you use the [credentials Element for forms for authentication (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5a001f8-fdbe-4c88-80ca-bfe36df23479) section, be sure to follow the guidelines explained at [ASP.NET Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1). 延展性和較佳的安全性，建議您使用外部資料庫來儲存使用者的認證。For scalability and better security, it is recommended you use an external database to store the users' credentials. 如需有關建立安全的 ASP.NET 應用程式的詳細資訊，請搜尋 Microsoft MSDN 網站 (msdn.microsoft.com) 」 保護 ASP.NET 應用程式 」 和 「 建置安全的 ASP.NET 應用程式： 驗證、 授權及安全通訊。 」For more information about building secure ASP.NET applications, search the Microsoft MSDN Web site (msdn.microsoft.com) for "Securing Your ASP.NET Application" and "Building Secure ASP.NET Applications: Authentication, Authorization, and Secure Communication." ``` defaultUrl="formsdefault.aspx" protection="Encryption" timeout="5" path="aspnet" slidingExpiration="false" cookieless="UseCookies" domain="domainName"> ``` [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationUser#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationUser/CS/formsauthenticationuser.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationUser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationUser/VB/formsauthenticationuser.vb#1)]
